page.title: 05THE VILLAGE:EATON UPON TERN
page.content: Most of the people who live in the village who we asked why it was called Eaton Upon Tern, had no idea. Heavy goods vehicals are not suposed to go through the village, but when they do they disturb the peace, they go through by mistake mainly because they lose their way along the lanes and end up getting to the airfield through the village. During the war the airfield was used for all the services, now it is a small part of the industry of agriculture around the area, planes are kept there for crop spraying. Mainly retired people live in that area and there is not any sociel life at all. You have to have a car really if you live in that area, only two households have not got a car, Uperton is where the nearest shop is. Women who live there do not go to work, instead they stay at home.
